entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: `X86Base.Rep*` intrinsics #98621
  • memcpy/memset helpers on CoreCLR may not be suspension-friendly #98620
  • NativeAot proposal: set /DEPENDENTLOADFLAG linker flag by default on Windows #98619
  • Add standard numeric format for octal integers #98618
  • SYSLIB1051 on parameter when type imported from other assembly #98616
  • Swift interop tests fail to build for NativeAOT #98611
  • Segmentation fault in System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Tests #98609
  • [browser][MT] lock_thread: g_assert (thread->longlived->synch_cs) #98604
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/Roslyn/CscBench/CscBench.cmd #98596
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamCertificateContextOcspLinuxTests.RefreshOcspResponse_BeforeExpiration #98595
  • Test failure: System.Runtime.CompilerServices.UnsafeTests.BitCast #98594
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json source generator doesn't handle `ReadOnlySpan<T>` properties correctly #98590
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Marking a BlockingCollection with CompleteAdding() later causes System.OperationCanceledException to be thrown #97946
  • `FrozenDictionary<,>` doesn't include the key in `KeyNotFoundException` #98588
    9.0.0
  • [browser][mt] RangeError: Invalid atomic access index #96545
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT: Memset/Memcpy helpers don't throw NRE #95517
    Future
  • Why doesn't C++/CLI write the name of the library when calling extern functions? #98606
  • Random.Shuffle fails on covariant array #98470
  • Need to move off osx.1015.amd64.open queues #80029
    7.0.x
  • NativeAOT publish fails on fi_FI.utf8 locale #98550
    9.0.0
  • Performance issue with generic method returning struct ref #98598
  • `RequestReJITWithInliners` silently fails for debug modules if `COMPLUS_ForceEnc` is enabled #91963
    9.0.0
  • `UnsafeAccessor` throws `MissingFieldException` on generic field (`T`) #92633
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Additional Hash Algorithms for X509SubjectKeyIdentifierHashAlgorithm #97158
    9.0.0
  • Add `Volatile.Read(in X)` overloads: #98592

PullRequests

Created

  • Move memset/memcpy helpers to managed impl #98623
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Revise compiler hardening options on Unix #98622
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Include namespace in the reflection error message #98617
    area-System.Reflection
  • Delete MemoryHelpers.Memset #98615
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ensure file-opening exceptions emerge asynchronously from File.Append/WriteAllLinesAsync #98612
    area-System.IO
  • JIT: Remove fgExpandQmarkForCastInstOf #98610
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Fix switching between single and multi threaded runtimes without clean #98607
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add alpine support in install-native-deps script #98603
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix NativeAOT publish failure on fi_FI culture (#98552) #98601
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • ObjWriter: Do not generate relocations within .debug_info for DW_AT_type #98597
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Expand String.EndsWith/MemoryExtensions.EndsWith in JIT #98593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Faster IndexOfAny for IgnoreCase Ascii letters #96588
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Add null checks into memcpy/memset helpers #98547
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix missing closing parens in Microsoft.DotNet.ILCompiler.SingleEntry.targets #98600
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Include key in FrozenDictionary.this[] KeyNotFoundException #98613
    area-System.Collections
  • [browser][MT] try to fix "Invalid atomic access index" #98608
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Remove test exclusion for dotnet/runtimelab#164 #98614
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Mono][RISCV] Fix bugs so that pass more regression tests #98602
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono] Do not throw in AssemblyExtensions.TryGetRawMetadata. #96370
    area-System.Reflection, runtime-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix initial context for HW exceptions in the new EH #98605
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix Random.Shuffle covariance #98471
    area-System.Runtime
  • Fix NativeAOT publish failure on fi_FI culture #98552
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix error message for byref of byref TypeLoadException #98548
    area-System.Reflection
  • Check for EnC in profiler ReJIT #98546
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Delete type_traits.h #98553
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add additional hash algorithms for X.509 SKI calculation #98579
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Forward the pgoinstrument argument to the inner build for VMR/Source-build builds #98446
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use Ubuntu-22.04-based Tizen image #98589
    needs-area-label

Updated

  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix some generic math DIMs to have the correct behavior #98510
    area-System.Numerics
  • [wasm] pinvoke improvements part 2 #98250
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement ReadOnlySpan.CastUp #98395
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] JSType.OneWay fire and forget #98567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Rewrite DbBuffer Read/Write methods with stackalloc #88395
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Simplify BigInteger.Multiply #98587
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Streaming mode for SPMI #98440
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add missing type name parsing test coverage #98562
    area-System.Reflection
  • Enable new exception handling by default #98570
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Importer forward substitution #98380
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Run tests in parallel #98492
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Fold more casts #98528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update RapidJSON #98573
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • JIT: Stop reporting FP locals as being on the x87 stack for 32-bit platforms #98580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove more ZapDisable/ZapRequire references #98569
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Prevent incorrect constant folding #98561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][mt] Guard more places for blocking wait on JS interop threads #98508
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • JIT: Support storing Swift error register value to SwiftError struct #98586
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cse new candidate strategy #98467
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_HY_3A` to `SVE_IB_3A` #98468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [no merge] Draft: infrastructure to build runtime components using NativeAOT #98565
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Add scalar evolution analysis and do IV widening based on it #97865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
